meanings.definition: A predatory insect with elongated bodies and grasping forelimbs.
meanings.sent1: The mantid caught its prey with its strong forelimbs.
meanings.sent2: I saw a mantid crawling on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent3: The mantid decided to have a feast on the unsuspecting grasshopper.
meanings.sent4: She moved with the precision of a mantid, ready to strike at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The mantid's stealthy movements made it a formidable hunter.

meanings.definition: A member of the Mantidae family of insects.
meanings.sent1: The mantid species in our garden are fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of mantids to learn more about their ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The mantid family reunion was a buzzing affair.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a mantid in a world full of butterflies, unique and misunderstood.
meanings.sent5: The mantid's presence in the garden added a touch of mystery to the surroundings.
